name: Time to Surprise
description:
Assassinate all the enemies in one go or they wil raise the alarm. Plan your way to success. 

Controls: WASD to move player (Blue). You have 6 bullets. Click on enemies to register a shot. Backspace to rewind time. When the player moves, time progresses and you have 2 seconds to assassinate everyone.

Alt+Tab to close in Windows.

Bugs: Ricochet Messy. Lines not drawing correctly, Shots created in before moving at 0.00 don't get rewound. And only one level... as is the way.

Single Person Team, Made with Unity.
